original_title: Doja Cat: Planet Her | Vevo Live Performances
overview: Spend time roaming ‘Planet Her’ and you’ll know that Doja Cat’s artistic vision never sleeps. The singer’s desire to develop rich musical and visual environments for her fans is job one, and her third album, coming after ‘Amala’ and ‘Hot Pink,’ is her most fully-realized statement yet - surely one of the reasons the singer's career exploded in the last year. Doja, banking on a combo of skills, artistry, and perseverance performs  "Need To Know," "Love To Dream," and "Ain't Shit."
title: Doja Cat: Planet Her | Vevo Live Performances
